description: After Brother Tanner left, Pearl couldn’t stop thinking about how perfect his cock was. She was happy she was able to please him and bring him to climax. And somehow it was made even hotter by having her father see it. The Seed Bearer was proud of her and insisted she be prepared for her covenant. title: Sister Pearl Unveiling
